example_utterances: Of course, I couldn't turn down the invitation. Your house is lovely.
Oh, things have been pretty good. Just busy with work as usual. How about you?
Time sure does fly. But it's a joy to watch them grow and learn.
No, I haven't heard about that. That sounds interesting though. What kind of classes are they offering?
That sounds like a great opportunity. I'll have to check it out.
Hey, good to see you again. I'm doing well, thanks. How about you?
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. Is everything okay now?
That's really tough. Is there anything I can do to help?
Absolutely, I'd be happy to spread the word and maybe even pick up a bouquet myself sometime soon.
Yes, it was beautiful! And speaking of that visit, I was actually thinking of inviting you over this weekend. We could catch up over some coffee.
